inn1.comm: down the leg side and England are off the mark with a wide
back of a length on leg stump, tucked out to midwicket...this game now has a legal delivery
outside off stump, angled across Cook who leaves it alone
short of a length outside off, Cook happy to let another one go past off stump...no great pace in the surface
beaten this time, closer to off stump but it's this ball that Cook shapes to cut and is cramped for room
fuller on off stump, pushed firmly into the off side
full outside off, Cook leaves alone again
on off stump, Bell stays back and defends towards mid-off
pulls the length back shorter, Bell advances towards the bowler and opens the face to play to backward point
fuller and wider outside off, Bell chases but doesn't make contact and thinks it should be a wide...just okay
first run off the back, short of a length on off stump, Bell opens the face down to third man
adjusts well to the left hander, full on off stump, Cook comes forward and pushes to the off side
beaten outside off, some late away movement from Cook who pushes away from his body without any footwork
back of a length on off stump, Bell defends square into the off side
tries something more aggressive, just gives himself a touch of room to drive but can only clump the delivery back to Morkel
angled into Bell who works it into the leg side short of mid-on and scampers the run
run out chance! Full delivery pushed towards mid-off and Cook would have been miles short if Parnell had hit but he missed the stumps by a huge distance
play and a miss...back of a length, Bell tries to go through the off side and moves slightly to leg and the ball ends up missing leg stump
an ugly heave into the leg side but he can only pick out mid-on
good shot, full outside off, Cook leans into a powerful cover drive and even across the slow outfield the ball beats the fielder
short of a length outside off, Cook shapes to cut and is beaten on the top edge
takes a stride down the pitch and lofts this over cover, not timed as well as earlier in the over and it pulls up short of the rope
cracking shot, down the pitch to a fullish ball on off stump and handsomely driven up and over mid-off...one bounce over the boundary
coming at the bowler again, doesn't connect cleanly with this drive and it runs along the ground to mid-on who is on the edge of the circle
outside off, driven without much timing into the covers
huge blow! Clean strike from Bell. Uses his feet to Morkel - which is no mean feat - then picks up over the leg side and the ball comfortably clears the boundary
now he goes inside out through the off side, gave himself a touch of room and drove this from around middle and leg stump through the covers
full on off stump, opens the face and sends it fine of backward point down to third man
shot! Bell's flying. Opens his stance to free up the off side then drives him with a straight bat high over mid-off...he isn't in the Twenty20 squad
tries to glide this through the off side and is beat by ball that is a touch shorter
full on off stump, opens the face to try and place into a gap at cover but picks out a fielder
dragged down short outside off stump and pulled to deep square-leg
lovely placement from Bell, he walks across the crease then flicks a back-of-a-length delivery over short fine-leg
well-timed again, on off stump and driven but straight to the man at cover
